plot: Three guests channel surf through the hundreds of digital TV stations, commenting live on what they see. A "human programme guide", they come up with the most interesting and often bizzare things on the small screen, as they happen.
plot_en: Three guests channel surf through the hundreds of digital TV stations, commenting live on what they see. A "human programme guide", they come up with the most interesting and often bizzare things on the small screen, as they happen.
plot_es: Three guests channel surf through the hundreds of digital TV stations, commenting live on what they see. A "human programme guide", they come up with the most interesting and often bizzare things on the small screen, as they happen.
title: Flipside TV
